name: Bunny’s at your side
description:
You are inside a nightmare! Escape from monsters until it becomes day and you wake up.  But don’t worry. You’re not alone! Bunny will be by your side to help you overcome the monsters.

Touching the monsters increases stress amount, rest and hug your bunny to remain calm and reduce your stress. Swing your bunny to knock back your enemies so that you can keep your fears away!

Run around in your bedroom from cars, colorful balls, a toy mouse and a roomba. Make sure to not mistakenly step one of the building bricks because I’m pretty sure that’s gonna be painful.

This game was made with unity and used krita and procreate for game art. Used bfxr for sound effects and some SFX are from freesound.org. I worked with my friend that helped me with the game design and game art.

SFX I used:

https://freesound.org/people/Audeption/sounds/425174/

https://freesound.org/people/Nightflame/sounds/422513/

https://freesound.org/people/EVRetro/sounds/533034/
